definitions.definition: A town in Bertie County , North Carolina , United States .
An extinct town and former trading post in Camden County , Georgia , United States .
Five townships in Ohio and Pennsylvania , United States , listed under Colerain Township .

main_definition: A town in Bertie County , North Carolina , United States .
secondary_definitions: An extinct town and former trading post in Camden County , Georgia , United States .
Five townships in Ohio and Pennsylvania , United States , listed under Colerain Township .
